ui.forceResignMessage: You have been force-resigned: Self-destructing all your units is considered unwanted behavior when you still have teammates playing.

quit.reallyQuit: Are you sure you want to quit?
quit.reallyQuitResign: Are you sure you want to resign or return to game lobby?
quit.reallyResign: Are you sure you want to resign?
quit.reallyResignSpectate: Are you sure you want to resign and spectate?

topbar.catchingUpTooltip:
Displays the catch-up progress
Game time: %{gameTime}
topbar.commanderCountTooltip: Displays the number of ally and enemy commanders
topbar.tidalspeedTooltip: Tidal speed on this map (always constant)
topbar.windspeedTooltip:
(small numbers are minimum and maximum)
Average wind speed on this map is %{avgWindValue}
Current wind risk is %{riskWindValue} (percentage of time wind speed will be below 6)
%{warnColor}It is better to build Solar Collectors when average
%{warnColor}wind speed is below 5 (Armada) or 6 (Cortex)

resources.shareMetalTooltip: Share excess metal above this point with your team
resources.shareEnergyTooltip: Share excess energy above this point with your team
resources.pullTooltip:
The desired demand for %{resource} (per second) provided that there is sufficient supply and storage.
Builders on low-priority will only use leftover resources and thus their demand isn't counted here.
resources.conversionTooltip:
Excess energy above this point
will power your Energy Converters

converter_usage.defaultTooltip: Shows how many of your energy converters are active and producing metal
converter_usage.tooManyConverters1Tooltip: You have too many energy converters for your energy production.
converter_usage.tooManyConverters2Tooltip: Stop building energy converters and increase your energy production.

playersList.pointClickTooltip: Click to go to the last point set by the player

chat.takeTeamAmount: I took %{name}: %{units} units, %{energy} energy and %{metal} metal.

playerTV.tooltip:
Auto camera-track the top ranked players
(switches player every 40 seconds by default)
playerTV.playerViewTooltip: Only view what the player can see
playerTV.playerCameraTooltip: Follow player camera perspective and apply selections

teamEconomy.tooltip:
Total metal/energy income
(Lighter portion is income from reclaiming)

orderMenu.move_tooltip: Move a unit towards a position or follow other units
orderMenu.attack_tooltip: Attack a unit or ground position
orderMenu.areaattack_tooltip: Area attack everything within a circle (click-drag)
orderMenu.manuallaunch_tooltip: Launch a missile at a target
orderMenu.patrol_tooltip: Patrol along one or more waypoints
orderMenu.fight_tooltip: Order units to take action while moving to a position
orderMenu.resurrect_tooltip: Revive wrecks to become units again (click-drag for area)
orderMenu.guard_tooltip: Guard another unit against enemy units attacking it
orderMenu.wait_tooltip: Pause a unit/factory on processing command/build queues
orderMenu.reclaim_tooltip: Suck metal/energy from wrecks or features (trees/stones)
orderMenu.restore_tooltip: Restore an area of the map to its original height
orderMenu.capture_tooltip: Convert units that belong to the enemy (or ally)
orderMenu.settarget_tooltip: Set a prioritized target (prioritizes targeting when target in range)
orderMenu.areamex_tooltip: Click-drag an area to auto queue metal extractors for all available metal spots
orderMenu.loadunits_tooltip: Load unit or multiple units within an area in the transport
orderMenu.unloadunits_tooltip: Unload unit or multiple units within an area in the transport
orderMenu.landatairbase_tooltip: Go to nearest Air Repair Pad
orderMenu.stopproduction_tooltip: Clear build queue for all units on selected factories
orderMenu.morph_tooltip: Upgrade to next Tech-level (second click to cancel)
orderMenu.firestate_tooltip: Set under what conditions a unit should start firing at enemies (without explicit attack order)
orderMenu.movestate_tooltip: Set how far out of its way a unit should move to attack enemies
orderMenu.priority_tooltip: Assigns resources to use for this builder when not having enough for all
orderMenu.onoff_tooltip: Active state: turn a unit on/off
orderMenu.idlemode_tooltip: Sets what aircraft do when idle
orderMenu.apLandAt_tooltip: Sets what aircraft do when leaving air factory
orderMenu.autorepairlevel_tooltip: Set at which HP %% this aircraft retreats to nearest air repair pad
orderMenu.apAirRepair_tooltip: Air factory: Set at which health %% an aircraft should automatically move to and land on an air repair pad
orderMenu.trajectory_tooltip: Sets fire mode in artillery state (firing upwards instead of forwards)

customOnOff.trajectory_tooltip: Switch artillery firing angle between low and high trajectory
customOnOff.siege_tooltip: Switches between Focused Fire and longer ranged Spread Fire
customOnOff.gauss_tooltip: Switches between Gauss Cannon and Heavy Plasma Cannon

idleBuilders.name: Idle Builders
idleBuilders.controls:
Click:   Select and cycle next builder
SHIFT + Click:   Select all

unitGroups.name: Unit Groups
unitGroups.rightclick: Right-Click:   move to and select group
unitGroups.tooltip:
CTRL + 0-9 sets unit group for selected units.
CTRL BACKQUOTE (~) remove units.
unitGroups.autogroupTooltip:
Auto Groups
ALT + 0-9 sets autogroup # for selected unit type(s).
Newly built units get added to group# equal to their autogroup#.
ALT BACKQUOTE (~) remove units.
View settings at: Settings/Interface/AutoGroup

keybinds.title: Keybinds
keybinds.disclaimer: These keybinds are set by default. If you remove/replace hotkey widgets, or use your own uikeys, they might stop working!
keybinds.howtochangekeybinds:
To change them: in Settings/Control tab, set Keybindings to Custom to create the BAR/data/bar_hotkeys_custom.lua file.
Edit this file and select Custom to reload them.

camera.title: Camera movement
camera.panKey: arrow keys / mouse at screen edge

queues.title: Queueing orders
queues.append: Add order to end of order queue
queues.prepend: Add order to start of order queue

massSelect.title: Group selection
massSelect.group: Select all units assigned to group (num)
massSelect.sameType: Select all units of same type as selected

gametypeInfo.commandersSurviveDgun: Commanders survive D-Guns and commander explosions
gametypeInfo.unbalancedCommanders: Unbalanced Commanders is enabled: Commander levels up and gains upgrades
gametypeInfo.owncomends: Losing your commander = losing control of your units / resigning
gametypeInfo.dgunrule: When you have only 1 commander left: D-Gunning an enemy commander results in you losing
gametypeInfo.dgunruleExplanation: (this rule was invented to prevent a cheap win/draw)

startSpot.startbox: Pick a startspot within the green area, and click the Ready button. (F4 shows metal spots)
startSpot.anywhere: Pick a startspot and click the Ready button. (F4 shows metal spots)

screenMode.title: Screen mode: %{highlightColor}%{screenMode}
screenMode.overview: Press %{highlightColor}[%{keyset}]%{textColor} to zoom onto mouse position
screenMode.heightmap: [%{keyset}] Displays a different color for every height level
screenMode.pathing: [%{keyset}] Shows where the selected unit can move, Green: okay, Red: problematic, Purple: can't move
screenMode.resources:
[%{keyset}] Highlights metal spots in green and geothermal vents in yellow.
    Occupied metal spots are shown in red.

chickens.queenIsAngry2: Prepare yourself for the final battle!
chickens.queenResistant: The Queen is becoming resistant to %{unit} attacks!
chickens.resistanceUnits: The Queen is becoming resistant to:

loadScreen.intelGpuWarning: %{textColor}You are using the integrated %{warnColor}Intel graphics%{textColor} card.     It's currently %{warnColor}unsupported, the game won't work properly.

initialSpawn.tooClose: You cannot place your start position too close to another player

substitutePlayers.substitutionMessage: If player(s) are idle when the game starts, you might be used as a substitute
substitutePlayers.offerWithdrawn: You have withdrawn your offer to substitute
substitutePlayers.substituted: Substitution occurred, revealing all start positions

idlePlayers.warning: You are idling, do something quick! (others are able to take over all your things soon)

ffaNoOwner.disconnected: No Owner Mode: Team %{team} has %{gracePeriod} minute(s) to reconnect

factions.arm: Outsmart your foes with tactical finesse
factions.cor: Smash your foes with brute force
factions.leg: This faction is still a work in progress

settings.changesrequirerestart: * Changes will require a restart (next game)

option.resolution_descr: WARNING: sometimes freezes game engine in windowed mode
option.vsync_descr: Prevent vertical screen tearing. Note this can introduce slight lag. Try adaptive for less screen draw delay.
option.limitidlefps_descr:
Reduces fps when idle (by setting vsync to a high number)
(for borderless window and fullscreen need engine not have focus)
Makes your pc more responsive/cooler when you do stuff outside the game
Camera movement will break idle mode
option.msaa_descr: Enables multisample anti-aliasing. NOTE: Can be expensive!
option.cas_sharpness_descr: How much sharpening should be applied to 3d world space
option.cus_descr: Enables: depth texture, looking damaged, lights that blink, environment lighting, moving tank tracks.
option.darkenmap_descr: Darkens the whole map (not the units)
option.darkenmap_darkenfeatures_descr:
Darkens features (trees, wrecks, ect..) along with darken map slider above

NOTE: Can be CPU intensive: it cycles through all visible features
and renders them another time.
option.advmapshading_descr: Enables: depth texture, detail textures, improved lighting, shadows.
option.ssao_descr: WARNING: might introduce a bit of lag
option.ssao_quality_descr: Lower qualities have lower SSAO resolution, which can result in SSAO flicker for moving units/camera
option.bloomdeferred_descr: Unit highlights and lights will glow.
option.bloomdeferred_quality_descr: Lower qualities have lower bloom resolution, which can result in bloom flicker for moving units/camera
option.mapedgeextension_descr: Mirrors the map at screen edges and darkens and decolorizes them.
option.mapedgeextension_curvature_descr: Curve the mirrored edges away into the floor/seabed
option.decals_descr:
0 = Off
NOTE: Changes might require a restart (if you turn it On/Off)
option.decalsgl4_lifetime_descr: ...changes only apply to newly created scars
option.grounddetail_descr: Set how detailed the map mesh/model is
option.uniticonscaleui_descr: Unit model disappears when the icon covers it completely
option.uniticondistance_descr: sets the distance when icons appear
option.uniticonfadeamount_descr: sets the distance when icons appear
option.uniticonhidewithui_descr: dont show icons when disabling UI (via F5)
option.featuredrawdist_descr: Features (trees, stones, wreckage) stop being displayed at this distance
option.particles_descr:
Particle limit used for explosions, smoke, fire, missile trails and build particles

Beware: too low value can result in missing effects.
option.lighteffects_descr: Adds lights to projectiles, lasers and explosions.
option.lighteffects_brightness_descr: Set the brightness of the lights
option.lighteffects_radius_descr:
Set the radius of the lights

WARNING: the bigger the radius, the heavier on the GPU
option.lighteffects_buildlights_descr: Adds rotating construction builder lights to units
option.dof_autofocus_descr: Disable to have mouse position focus
option.dof_fstop_descr:
Set amount of blur

Only works if autofocus is off
option.grass_desc: Show patches of grass on certain maps
option.grassdistance_desc: The distance that grass remains visible
option.treewind_descr:
Makes trees wave in the wind.

(will not apply to every tree type)
option.heatdistortion_descr: Adds a distortion effect to explosions and flames
option.snow_descr: Snow widget (By default.. maps with wintery names have snow applied)
option.snowmap_descr:
It will remember what you toggled for every map

(by default: maps with wintery names have this toggled)
option.snowautoreduce_descr:
Automaticly reduce snow when average FPS gets lower

(re-enabling this needs time to readjust  to average fps again
option.snowamount_descr: disable "auto reduce" option to see the max snow amount you have set
option.xmas_descr: disabling will make the xmas ball invisible (other decorations stay)
option.snddevice_descr:
Select a sound device
default means your default OS playback device
option.soundtracknew_descr: Add the orchestral themed music to the soundtrack
option.soundtrackold_descr: Add the modern themed music to the soundtrack
option.soundtrackcustom_descr:
Add your own .ogg music files to the soundtrack playlist
Place these .ogg music files in data/music/custom/ subfolders: peace/warlow/warhigh/bossfight/gameover
option.soundtracksilence_descr:
Adds no-music breaks between tracks
to give you some time to enjoy pure sound effects
and to make the music less repetitive.
option.soundtrackinterruption_descr:
Allows the music to cut off mid-track
to switch to different intensity level
when action pace changes quickly.
option.soundtrackfades_descr: Fade-in and Fade-out music when it starts, ends or cuts.
option.sndairabsorption_descr:
Air absorption is basically a low-pass filter relative to distance between
sound source and listener, so when in your base or zoomed out, front battles
will be heard as only low frequencies
option.muteoffscreen_descr: Game will mute itself when mouse is offscreen until you return
option.loadscreen_music_descr: Music when displaying the startup load screen
option.notifications_tutorial_descr:
Additional messages that guide you how to play

It remembers what has been played already
(Re)enabling this will reset this
option.notifications_volume_descr: NOTE: it also uses interface volume channel (Sound tab)
option.notifications_playtrackedplayernotifs_de: Displays notifications from the perspective of the currently camera tracked player
option.hwcursor_descr: When disabled: mouse cursor refresh rate will equal to your ingame fps
option.cursorsize_descr:
Note that cursor already auto-scales according to screen resolution

Further adjust size and snap to a smaller/larger size
option.doubleclicktime_descr: Time in ms between two consectutive left clicks to be considered a doubleclick
option.dragthreshold_descr: Number of pixels of mouse movement for a click to be considered a drag
option.crossalpha_descr:
Opacity of mouse icon in center of screen when you are in camera pan mode

(The'icon' has a dot in center with 4 arrows pointing in all directions)
option.middleclicktoggle_descr: Enable camera pan toggle via single middle mouse click
option.containmouse_descr: When in windowed mode, this prevents your mouse from moving out of it
option.screenedgemove_descr: If mouse is close to screen edge, this will move camera
option.screenedgemovedynamic_descr: Enable if scrolling speed should fade with edge distance.
option.camerashake_descr: Set the amount of camerashake on explosions
option.camerasmoothness_descr: How smooth should the transitions between camera movement be?
option.mincamheight_descr:
Limit the max amount the camera can zoom in

Higher = camera can zoom in less
option.scrolltoggleoverview_descr: toggle overview camera when using scrollwheel
option.lockcamera_transitiontime_descr:
When viewing a players camera...
how smooth should the transitions between camera movement be?
option.guishader_descr: Blurs the world under every user interface element
option.font_descr: Regular read friendly font used for text
option.font2_descr: Stylistic font mainly used for names/buttons/titles
option.teamcolors_descr:
Replaces lobby colors with an autogenerated color palette based one

NOTE: reloads all widgets because these need to update their colors
option.sameteamcolors_descr:
Use the same teamcolor for all the players in a team

NOTE: reloads all widgets because these need to update their teamcolors
option.anonymous_descr:
Set the anonymized player color used for the interface
(changing value will take a few seconds to reload interface)
option.simpleteamcolors_use_gradient: Use a different shade for each player.
option.simpleteamcolors_descr: Make all enemies have the same color
option.dualmode_enabled_descr: Fill a separate screen with minimap. On a single monitor, divides screen in half
option.dualmode_left_descr: Uses the left screen for dual mode if enabled, otherwise the right one
option.dualmode_minimap_aspectratio_descr: Keeps dual screen content aspect ratio if enabled, otherwise stretch to fill
option.minimap_enlarged_descr: Relocates the order-menu to make room for the minimap
option.minimap_maxheight_descr: Allocate a max height for the minimap (remember: width is limited as well)
option.minimapleftclick_descr:
Left mouse button will move the camera (it is middle mouse by default)
when disabled: left click(drag) will be selecting units.
option.minimapcanflip_descr: will automatically flip the minimap when camera perspective is from the other side
option.gridmenu_descr:
Alternative comprehensive build menu
Goto: control tab > keybinds to enable its optimized shortcuts
option.buildmenu_bottom_descr: Relocate the buildmenu to the bottom of the screen
option.buildmenu_maxposy_descr:
Set a maximum height position the buildmenu will stick to
(menu will be directly under minimap unless it gets higher than this amount of the screen)
option.buildmenu_alwaysshow_descr: Not hiding when no builders are selected
option.buildmenu_prices_descr:
Unit prices in the buildmenu

(when disabled: still show when hovering icon)
option.ordermenu_bottompos_descr: Relocate the ordermenu to the bottom of the screen
option.ordermenu_alwaysshow_descr: Not hiding when no buttons are available
option.ordermenu_hideset_descr:
Hide the ordermenu commands that have shortcuts:
Move, Stop, Attack, Patrol, Fight, Wait, Guard, Reclaim, Repair, D-Gun
option.unitgroups_descr:
Show unit groups interface
located at the bottom of the screen (unless you have the buildmenu there)
option.info_buildlist_descr: Regarding factories/builders: display an icon list of all buildable units instead of other info.
option.info_mappos_descr: Display the mouse cursors map position and elevation
option.advplayerlist_skill_descr: show the player openskill number (used for balancing algorithm)
option.advplayerlist_income_descr:
displays the energy/metal income values
(if you have team members)
option.advplayerlist_share_descr:
show (quick) share buttons
NOTE: auto hides when having no team members
option.advplayerlist_absresbars_descr: resbar values and max storages are displayed on the scale of teamplayer that has max storage
option.systemprivacy_descr:
disallow other players to view your system specifications (in player list tooltip)
applies to next game
option.mascot_descr: Shows a mascot on top of the playerlist
option.unittotals_descr: Show your unit totals on top of the playerlist
option.musicplayer_descr: Show music player on top of playerlist
option.console_hide_descr: Hides chat and console. (scrollable ui interface still available)
option.console_chatvolume_descr: Customize the volume of incoming chat messages
option.console_mapmarkvolume_descr: Customize the volume of mapmark points/messages
option.console_handleinput_descr: Integrates chat text input instead of using in-engine method
option.console_inputbutton_descr: Enable text input mode toggle button
option.continuouslyclearmapmarks_descr: Continuously clear all map marks: drawings and points
option.autoeraser_descr: Enable auto erasing of map markers and drawings
option.autoeraser_erasetime_descr: Erase map marks/drawings after X seconds
option.idlebuilders_descr: Displays a row of idle builder units at the bottom of the screen
option.buildbar_descr:
Displays a column of factories at the right side of the screen
hover and click units to quickly add to the factory queue
option.converterusage_descr: Displays the current energy->metal converter usage at the top of the screen
option.teamplatter_descr: Shows a team color platter above all visible units
option.teamplatter_opacity_descr: Set the opacity of the team spotters
option.enemyspotter_descr:
Draws smoothed circles under enemy units

Disables when enemy is single colored or alone
option.enemyspotter_opacity_descr: Set the opacity of the enemy-spotter rings
option.selectedunits_descr:
Draws a platter under selected units

NOTE: this widget can be heavy when having lots of units selected
option.selectedunits_opacity_descr: Set the opacity of the highlight on selected units
option.selectedunits_teamcoloropacity_descr: Set the amount of teamcolor used for the base platter
option.highlightunit_descr: Highlight the unit that is under the mouse cursor
option.highlightselunits_opacity_descr: Set the opacity of the highlight on selected units
option.highlightselunits_teamcolor_descr: Use teamcolor instead of unit health coloring
option.metalspots_descr: Shows a circle around (unoccupied) metal spots with the amount of metal in it
option.metalspots_values_descr:
Display metal values (during game)
Pre-gamestart or when in metalmap view (f4) this will always be shown

Note that it's significantly enough more costly to draw the text values
option.metalspots_metalviewonly_descr: Limit display to only during pre-gamestart or when in metalmap view (f4)
option.geospots_descr: Shows a circle around (unoccupied) geothermal spots
option.healthbarsvariable_descr: Increases healthbar sizes for bigger units
option.healthbarswhenguihidden_descr: even display bars when GUI is hidden (F5 mode)
option.healthbarshide_descr: Hide the healthbar and rely on damaged unit looks
option.rankicons_descr: Shows a rank icon depending on experience next to units
option.allycursors_descr: Shows the position of ally cursors
option.allycursors_playername_descr: Shows the player name next to the cursor
option.allycursors_spectatorname_descr: Shows the spectator name next to the cursor
option.allycursors_showdot_descr: Shows a dot at the center of ally cursor position
option.allycursors_lights_descr: Adds a colored light to every ally cursor
option.cursorlight_descr:
Adds a light at/above your cursor position

Needs "Lights" (graphics option) to be enabled
option.showbuilderqueue_descr: Shows ghosted buildings about to be built on the map
option.unitenergyicons_descr:
Shows a red power bolt above units that cant fire their most e consuming weapon
when you haven't enough energy available.
option.nametags_rank_descr:
Display the player rank icon left of the commander player name.
(only shown in multiplayer)
option.nametags_icon_descr: Show commander name when its displayed as icon
option.commandsfx_descr:
Shows unit target lines when you give orders

The commands from your teammates are shown as well
option.commandsfxuseteamcolors_descr: Make all the lines be teamcolors instead of command colors
option.commandsfxuseteamcolorswhenspec_descr: Make all the lines be teamcolors instead of command colors
option.displaydps_descr: Display the "Damage Per Second" done where target are hit
option.flankingicons_descr:
Display the flanking icons to show direction of armor strong/weak point
Encircle unit to achieve a larger damage bonus!
option.radarrange_descr: Displays the range of radar coverage with a green circle
option.sonarrange_descr: Displays the range of sonar coverage with a blue circle
option.jammerrange_descr: Displays the range of radar jammer coverage with an orange circle
option.losrange_descr: Displays the sight range with a (white or team colored) line
option.defrange_descr: Displays range of defenses (enemy and ally)
option.antiranges_descr: Displays the range of anti-nuke coverage
option.allyselunits_select_descr: When viewing a players camera, this selects what the player has selected
option.lockcamera_hideenemies_descr: When viewing a players camera, this will display what the tracked player sees
option.lockcamera_los_descr: When viewing a players camera and los, shows shaded los ranges too
option.playertv_countdown_descr: Countdown time before it switches player
option.displayselectedname_descr: Display the selected playername above the playerlist area
option.loadscreen_tips_descr: Show tips at the startup load screen
option.networksmoothing_descr:
Adds additional delay to assure smooth gameplay and stability
Disable for increased responsiveness: if you have a quality network connection
option.autoquit_descr:
Automatically quits after the game ends.
...unless the mouse has been moved within a few seconds.
option.smartselect_includebuildings_descr:
When rectangle-drag-selecting an area, include building units too?

Disabled: non-mobile units will be excluded (hold Shift to override)
Note: Construction Turrets will always be selected
option.smartselect_includebuilders_descr: When rectangle-drag-selecting an area, exclude builder units (hold Shift to override)
option.onlyfighterspatrol_descr: Only fighters obey a factory's patrol route after leaving airlab.
option.fightersfly_descr: Setting fighters on Fly mode when created
option.builderpriority_descr:
Sets builders (construction turrets, factories and constructors) on low priority mode

Low priority mode means that builders will only spend energy when its available.
Usage: Set the most important builders on high and leave the rest on low priority
option.unitreclaimer_descr:
Reclaim units within an area.
Hover over a unit and hold CTRL and drag area-reclaim circle to reclaim all units within, use ALT for just the type you hover over.
option.autogroup_immediate_descr:
Units built/resurrected/received are added to autogroups immediately,
instead when they get to be idle.

(add units to autogroup with ALT+number)
option.autogroup_persist_descr:
Autogroups persist in new games.
If this is enabled, units which were added to an autogroup in previous games
 will be added to the same group in this game.
option.factoryguard_descr: Newly created builders will assist their source factory
option.factoryholdpos_descr: Sets factories and units they produce, to hold position automatically (not aircraft)
option.factoryrepeat_descr: Sets new factories on Repeat mode
option.transportai_descr: Transport units automatically pick up new units going to factory waypoint.
option.settargetdefault_descr:
Replace default attack command to a set-target command
(when rightclicked on enemy unit)
option.dgunnogroundenemies: Dont snap DGun to ground units
option.dgunnogroundenemies_descr:
Prevents dgun aim to snap onto enemy ground units.
holding SHIFT will still target units

Will still snap to air, ships and hovers (when on water)
option.dgunstallassist_descr: When the D-Gun order is active, units that drain energy are pause their energy use.
option.singleplayerpause_descr:
Exclusively in singleplayer mode...

Pauses the game when showing the settings/quit window or lobby
option.catchupsmoothness_descr:
Higher smoothness/fps comes at the expense of catch up speed.
(higher value = less cpu time gets allocated to drawing)
option.widgetselector_descr: Allow the toggling of the widget selector interface (via F11)
option.devmode_descr: Toggle between how a developer or player see the UI
option.customwidgets_descr: enable loading of custom widgets (placed inside spring/luaui/widgets)
option.storedefaultsettings_descr: Do not remove engine defaults from springsettings.cfg
option.startboxeditor_descr:
LMB to draw (either clicks or drag), RMB to accept a polygon, D to remove last polygon
S to add a team startbox to startboxes_mapname.txt
(S overwites the export file for the first team)
